unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26th – Indian manufacturers are gearing up for the Diwali rush, placing increased emphasis on sophisticated inventory forecasting techniques. Dr. Anjali Sharma, Professor of Operations Management at IIM Ahmedabad, highlights the critical role of data analytics. "Accurate forecasting minimizes stockouts and reduces holding costs. Consider the demand for sweets like 'ladoos' - it's highly seasonal!"
